pr_title: Fix INSPIRE fetcher and short doi fetcher tests

timeline.message:
Fix INSPIRE fetcher and short doi fetcher tests

Arxiv Test is failing with the search phrase, because both queries return the same result

timeline.author: koppor

timeline.message:
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into fixFetcher
